main.description:
Welcome to my space!
Here, I share my journey in cybersecurity: projects, certifications, and CTFs. Always learning and growing. Curiosity drives me.
main.strong-1: creative ideas into immersive digital experiences,
main.text-2: focusing on enhancing usability and accessibility while designing impactful interfaces. I'm
main.strong-2: looking to advance my professional career,
main.text-3: contributing to innovative teams while continuing to learn and adapt to new technologies.
